column2: # same histogram, but for samples with SRM_present
ggplot(data = subset(dataset, dataset$SRM_present == TRUE), aes(x = subset(dataset$age_years, dataset$SRM_present == TRUE))) +
ggtitle("Histogram of Host Age for Sample with SRM") +
stat_bin(binwidth = 5, geom="text", aes(label=..count..), vjust=-0.5, size = 3, color="red")
